about.title: Our Mission
about.description: To revolutionize banking with digital solutions that are secure, user-friendly, and efficient.

about.title: Our Vision
about.description: To become the most trusted banking platform by integrating cutting-edge technology with financial services.

about.title: Why Choose us?
about.description: We offer secure transactions, fraud detection, automated loan processing, and real-time account management.

featuresNavbar.title: Customer Management
featuresNavbar.description: Manage customer details, view profiles, and update information.

featuresNavbar.title: Account Management
featuresNavbar.description: Open, close, and manage different types of bank accounts.

featuresNavbar.title: Transaction Management
featuresNavbar.description: Deposit, withdraw, and transfer funds with real-time processing.

featuresNavbar.title: Loan Management
featuresNavbar.description: Apply for loans, track repayments, and calculate interest automatically.

featuresNavbar.title: Interest & Fee Calculations
featuresNavbar.description: Automate interest calculations and penalties for late payments.

featuresNavbar.title: Reports & Statements
featuresNavbar.description: Generate and export account statements and financial reports.

featuresNavbar.title: Security & Fraud Detection
featuresNavbar.description: Role-based access control, encryption, and fraud alerts.

security.title: End-to-End Encryption
security.description: All transactions are encrypted to ensure your sensitive data is always protected.

security.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
security.description: Additional security layers to prevent unauthorized access to your account.

security.title: Fraud Detection System
security.description: Our AI-powered fraud detection monitors unusual activity to safeguard your funds.

faq.title: How does EliteBank protect my data?
faq.description: We use advanced encryption and secure authentication protocols to protect all user data.

faq.title: What should I do if I suspect fraud?
faq.description: Immediately contact our support team and change your credentials to secure your account.

faq.title: Can I enable additional security settings?
faq.description: Yes, you can enable multi-factor authentication and set up alerts for suspicious activity.
